ygData.subject: Re: NEAT4J in OSX, noob can't run xor example
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Oliver There isn t a UNIX based run script that comes with neat4j, it s on my todo list.  The best thing to do is convert the batch files into shell

Hi Oliver

There isn't a UNIX based run script that comes with neat4j, it's=
 on my
todo list.  The best thing to do is convert the batch files into she=
ll
scripts.  It should be easy, as the batch files a very simple.

Cheers

=

Matt
